Spider Queen

This page has been replaced with Spider Queen to maintain consistent naming conventions. Please update your bookmarks and references to use the new page.

Description

The Spider Queen is a formidable boss character with the body of a beautiful woman crossed with a hideous spider. Every living being in this lair is her servant. Meeting this extraordinary lady may turn out to be a deadly experience because you are trespasser!

Stats

  • HP: 120
  • Max HP: 120
  • Attack Skill: 21
  • Defense Skill: 18
  • Damage: 12-20
  • Damage Reduction: 10
  • EXP for Kill: 11

Special Abilities

  • Poison Attack: On successful hit, has a 50% chance to inflict Poison for 7-9 turns
  • Spider Spawning: Randomly spawns Spider Eggs in adjacent cells (approximately every 20 turns)
  • Phase 2 Behavior: When HP drops below 50%, she will retreat from enemies when they're within 5 tiles
  • Ranged Attack: Can only attack adjacent enemies when HP is above 50%
  • Fire Immunity: Completely immune to fire damage and burning effects

Drops

The Spider Queen drops one of the following items randomly:

  • Chaos Crystal (33% chance)
  • Spider Charm (33% chance)
  • Spider Armor (34% chance)
  • Skeleton Key (100% chance)

Location

* Found in the spider lair (Spider Level), typically at depths with 6s-10s in the level name * Part of the sub-levels of the dungeon

Strategy

* Keep your distance when she's at full health since she can only attack adjacent enemies * Be prepared for poison damage with antidotes or healing * Be aware that she will retreat when below 50% health, potentially making it harder to finish the fight * Fire or burning attacks are ineffective due to her immunity * Be ready to deal with spawned Spider Eggs during the fight
